devices.title: HiFi ESP
devices.description: HiFi ESP is a handy low cost media device that uses the legendary PCM5100 series DAC with supreme audio quality.

devices.title: ESP Audio Duo
devices.description: ESP Audio Duo is aimed to be paired with small-to-medium sized speakers in a small room. It uses a dual MAX98357 Hi-Fi DAC that will output 3W per speaker.

devices.title: Loud ESP
devices.description: Loud ESP is an ESP32-powered, rich-audio development board. Available with or without a color touchscreen, Loud ESP has a wealth of peripherals to support a wide range of user interaction. It is compact, portable, battery-powered, and uses a dual MAX98357 Hi-Fi DAC that will output 3W per speaker.

devices.title: Louder ESP
devices.description: Louder ESP is a top-of-the-range model that uses modern highly capable TAS5805M DAC and is aimed to be paired with medium-to-large speaker systems. With 25W per channel stereo output it packs a punch and can easily enliven living quarters or dorm rooms.

devices.title: HiFi-ESP32
devices.description: Reviewed design on the HiFi-ESP32 model includes onboard WROVER module with external Wifi antenna. It dramatically improved WiFi perception while usage of the WROVER module maintains lower device cost.

devices.title: Loud-ESP32
devices.description: Reviewed design on the ESP Audio Duo model includes onboard WROVER module with external Wifi antenna. It dramatically improved WiFi perception while usage of the WROVER module maintains lower device cost.

devices.title: Amped-ESP32
devices.description: As extension of the HiFi-ESP32 board, it adds a high quality D-class amp to the PCM5100 DAC. You can use either 3.5mm jack for line output (amp will be muted) or screw terminals to connect speakers.

devices.title: Louder-ESP32
devices.description: Reviewed design on the Louder-ESP32 model includes onboard WROVER module with external Wifi antenna. It dramatically improved WiFi perception while usage of the WROVER module maintains lower device cost.

devices.title: HiFi-ESP32S3
devices.description: HiFi-ESP32S3 is an ESP32-S3 version of the HiFi-ESP32. It does not support Bluetooth, but have more accessible PSRAM running at higher speed. Note, that squeezelite-esp32 support is still experimental on the S3.

devices.title: Loud-ESP32
devices.description: Loud-ESP32S3 is an ESP32-S3 version of the Loud-ESP32. It does not support Bluetooth, but have more accessible PSRAM running at higher speed. Note, that squeezelite-esp32 support is still experimental on the S3.

devices.title: Louder-ESP32S3
devices.description: Louder-ESP32S3 is an ESP32-S3 version of the Louder-ESP32. It is a top-of-the-range model that uses modern highly capable TAS5805M DAC. It does not support Bluetooth, but have more accessible PSRAM running at higher speed. Note, that squeezelite-esp32 support is still experimental on the S3.
